Function reference

Show glosses

Functions to use only in the R Markdown file

gloss()
Reference gloss
knit_print(<gloss>)
Print method for glosses

Styling

Functions to modify and view styling settings

use_glossr()
Use glossr
config_from_file()
Override configuration with a YAML file
set_style_options()
Set general styling options
print_config()
Print the glossr configuration

Create gloss objects

Functions to turn strings into the right gloss format.

as_gloss()
Helper to create gloss objects
gloss_pdf() gloss_html() gloss_tooltip() gloss_leipzig() gloss_word()
Render a gloss
gloss_df()
Render gloss from a dataframe
gloss_list()
Sublist glosses
gloss_factory()
Function factory to print glosses from dataframe

Dataset

Dataset used in vignettes.

glosses
Examples of glosses

Helpers for Latex glosses

Functions to help with Latex glosses

gloss_format_words()
Apply latex formatting to many words

Under the hood

Class constructors and other helpers

new_gloss_data()
gloss_data class
new_gloss()
gloss class
gloss_linetooltip()
Apply tooltip to a full gloss
